pages.text: Hellspec alloy is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Hellspec alloy can be obtained by crafting together iridium, black matter, and chthonic crystals.$(br2)Black matter can only be obtained after defeating the Trial Guardian.

pages.title: Hellspec Alloy
pages.text: Hellspec alloy holds the power of hell.
The smithing template drops from the Trial Guardian, and must be used on iridium to upgrade.
